body_html:
Hi Zou,
For what it's worth, I was able to compile tensorflow with the same configuration (although I'm on Gentoo rather than Ubuntu). Is the suggestion that a much older version of CUDA might be appropriate? Or an older version of gcc?

body:
Hi Zou,
For what it's worth, I was able to compile tensorflow with the same configuration (although I'm on Gentoo rather than Ubuntu).  Is the suggestion that a much  older version of CUDA might be appropriate?  Or an older version of gcc?
